title: High Water Bill Inquiry
description: A customer is calling because their water bill is significantly higher than usual and they suspect a leak.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's billing and usage history for the past 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the historical data and confirms the recent bill is an anomaly.

tasks.description: Analyze smart meter data to check for continuous flow, which indicates a potential leak.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes interval data and identifies constant water flow over a 24-hour period.

tasks.description: Advise the customer on how to check for common leaks (e.g., toilets, faucets) and offer to schedule a meter check.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides helpful advice and schedules a service order to inspect the meter.
